attributes.action: Reinforce the RPI as the measure of inflation.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The method used measure of inflation has changed from the RPI to the RPIX and now to the CPI. The sole purpose of this is to mask the true level of inflation, and provide a false sense of stability. The CPI is now 3% with the RPI much higher, possibly 5-6%. Restore the RPI as the official measure of inflation and regain some perspective of the true state of our economy.
